content.body: jarhar: nice, I also spotted https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/9957 and with regards to Document state I now wonder about CSP, which is apparently hold by the document in WebKit; I suspect Chromium has a similar thing where a Document has a context document, but that's not a thing that the specification has
